OOC:Thats rad....haha...I get a kick out of your "short post"  If only 
that constituted short in this rpg.  Also, I don't take anythign 
offensive to my person in an RPG, my character however, will.

IC:

On his way to the mess hall, Crotale hears every word of 
Skullhamer as if he was standing less then a foot from him, thanks 
to his extremely sensitve sensors and radars.  Muttering to himself 
he sat down at one of the tables.  "Your lucky we were  Autobots, 
ol'timer.  You would have been dead the way you rampaged in 
here. I think your only alive now because of the mercy Pacifix has.  
And my trust does not come as easily as his.  " He said this more 
of a reassurance to himself then anything else.
